page.title: 07 The Village Hall.
page.content: The Village Hall was built in 1975. It took a long time to collect the money to pay for it. The old village hall was made of wood but this one is made of concrete blocks. It is 100 square metres inside and there is room for about 90 people to sit down. There is a car park for 20 cars. There is a kitchen and two toilets. A management committee looks after it and there are twelve members from village organisations. The Hall is used for all kinds of things and people can hire it for parties or weddings. Last year it was used 180 times. Mrs. Doe is Vice Chairman of the management committee and she told us about it. Outside the Village Hall is the War Memorial and a large stone that was dug up when the Village Hall was being built.
